author: jstrachan
msg: added a first spike of camel-rest to make it easy to expose a CamelContext as a number of RESTful resources

author: ate
msg: Renaming the IS_PART association name constant to IS_MEMBER_OF which we currently use.
Adding several others which we will (eventually) support out-of-the-box.
Also adding constants for build-in supported JetspeedPrincipalType for user/group/role

author: dwoods
msg: rename release profile to staging to control what plugins are run, as the genesis release profile is causing source jars to be genereated which fail the enforcer check

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-2573 - Fix the location of the sca spring namespace. Thanks for the patch Ram

msg: honor followsymlinks on a fileset's dir as well.  PR 45741.
